ActorFrame.W1Command: %function(self) RzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if RzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W1P2'); end end
ActorFrame.W2Command: %function(self) RzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if RzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('W2P2'); end end

ActorFrame.W6Command: %function(self) RzCheckMetalClassicTaro = self:GetZ(); if RzCheckMetalClassicTaro > 0 then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP1'); else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end else MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2Right'); MESSAGEMAN:Broadcast('MissP2'); end end

ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) receptor_x_3_4 = 0 receptor_y_3_4 = 0 receptor_z_3_4 = 0 receptor_rotationx_3_4 = 0 receptor_rotationy_3_4 = 0 receptor_rotationz_3_4 = 0 receptor_zoomx_3_4 = 1 receptor_zoomy_3_4 = 1 receptor_zoomz_3_4 = 1 receptor_fadetop_3_4 = 0 receptor_fadebottom_3_4 = 0 receptor_fadeleft_3_4 = 0 receptor_faderight_3_4 = 0 receptor_croptop_3_4 = 0 receptor_cropbottom_3_4 = 0 receptor_cropleft_3_4 = 0 receptor_cropright_3_4 = 0 self:sleep(0); self:queuecommand('Update') end
ActorFrame.UpdateCommand: %function(self) self:x(receptor_x_3_4) self:y(receptor_y_3_4) self:z(receptor_z_3_4) self:rotationx(receptor_rotationx_3_4) self:rotationy(receptor_rotationy_3_4) self:rotationz(receptor_rotationz_3_4) self:zoomx(receptor_zoomx_3_4) self:zoomy(receptor_zoomy_3_4) self:zoomz(receptor_zoomz_3_4) self:fadetop(receptor_fadetop_3_4) self:fadebottom(receptor_fadebottom_3_4) self:fadeleft(receptor_fadeleft_3_4) self:faderight(receptor_faderight_3_4) self:croptop(receptor_croptop_3_4) self:cropbottom(receptor_cropbottom_3_4) self:cropleft(receptor_cropleft_3_4) self:cropright(receptor_cropright_3_4) self:sleep(0.05); self:queuecommand('Update') end
